Subjects enrol 2:1 ratio ( EndoBarrier sham ) . Following implantation sham procedure , subject treat 24 week 52 week . Following explant , subject follow additional 8-12 week . Subject evaluation include measurement HbA1c , glucose , insulin , weight , change diabetic medication , meal tolerance test . Safety monitor collection clinical lab , physical assessment , endoscopy adverse event .
